Caustic
export namespace
Caustic
CameraInfo
struct
CameraInfo

Contains information about a camera available on the system.  This structure is returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableVideoDevices.

Members
name

friendly name for the device

symlink

Symbolic link name for the device. This is passed to CreateWebCamera.

info

defines the media type returned by the camera

resolutions

list of supported resolutions

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

AudioInfo
struct
AudioInfo

Contains information about audio devices available on the system.  This structure is returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableAudioDevices.

Members
name

friendly name for the device

symlink

Symbolic link name for the device. This is passed to CreateWebCamera.

samplingRates

list of supported sampling rates

bitsPerSample

number of bits per sample

channels

number of audio channels

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

IWebCamera

Defines the interface to a WebCamera.

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

Functions
GetAvailableVideoDevices
static std::vector<CameraInfo> GetAvailableVideoDevices()

Returns a list of cameras available on the system

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

GetAvailableAudioDevices
static std::vector<AudioInfo> GetAvailableAudioDevices()

Returns a list of audio devices available on the system

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

CreateWebCamera
CRefObj<IWebCamera> CreateWebCamera(
std::wstring deviceName,
int w,
int h,
int frameRate,
std::wstring audiDeviceName,
int samplingRate,
int bitsPerSample,
int numChannels
)

Creates a new instance of WebCamera.

Parameters
videoDeviceName

symbolic link name for the camera as returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableVideoDevices

w
int

width in pixels of camera resolution

h
int

height in pixels of camera resolution

frameRate
int

requested frame rate

audioDeviceName

endpoint name for the audio device as returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableVideoDevices

samplingRate
int

sampling rate for audio

bitsPerSample
int

bits per sample for audio

numChannels
int

number of audio channels

Returns

Returns the newly created camera

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;
